response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product holds immense value not only financially but also in terms of its unique features and benefits that cater specifically to your needs and preferences. Given its exceptional worth, we are extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $950,000.

This offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. We believe that by accepting this proposal, you will be able to maximize the potential of this product, thereby enhancing your experience and achieving your goals more efficiently.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out to us. We are here to assist you every step of the way.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
